name: DD ROBOCON 2025
desc: Led electronics and embedded system design achieving All India Rank 1. Developed custom PCBs, multi-rail power systems, and integrated STM32-based motor control architecture.

name: ABU Robocon 2025
desc: Contributed to Team India achieving Global Rank 5. Worked on high-current power systems, embedded communication protocols, and robust hardware integration.

name: Turtle Chaser
desc: Built an autonomous ROS2 node to spawn and capture turtles using real-time pose tracking, services, and control-based navigation logic.

name: Autonomous Mapping in Webots
desc: Built a differential drive TurtleBot3 simulation in Webots with Python for autonomous mapping and navigation. Implemented sensor data processing, motion control, and environment exploration logic to generate real-time map representation in simulation.

name: Line Follower Robot
desc: Designed and implemented a high-precision differential drive line follower robot using Arduino Uno. Developed sensor-based feedback control algorithms, integrated IMU and motor driver modules, and tuned control parameters for stable trajectory tracking and dynamic correction.
